md:
giải nghĩa từ "throws" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Throws** (verb)

* Meaning: to propel or hurl something through the air with a quick motion of the arm or hand.
* Vietnamese: ném, tung, quăng.

Example sentence: "He throws the ball to his friend."

* Meaning: to cause something to be moved or directed in a particular way.
* Vietnamese: đẩy, hướng.

Example sentence: "The wind throws the door open."

**Throws** (noun)

* Meaning: a sudden, brief movement or action.
* Vietnamese: cú ném, cú đẩy.

Example sentence: "The athlete made a few throws to warm up before the competition."

* Meaning: a piece of fabric used to cover or decorate a piece of furniture.
* Vietnamese: tấm phủ, tấm trải.

Example sentence: "The living room has a beautiful throw on the couch."

Related words:

* Throwback (noun): a person or thing that is reminiscent of an earlier time. (Vietnamese: người/thứ mang lại kỷ niệm cũ)
* Throwaway (noun): something that is intended to be used once and then discarded. (Vietnamese: thứ dùng một lần rồi bỏ)
* Throw in (phrasal verb): to add something to a conversation or situation. (Vietnamese: thêm vào, góp ý)

Throws (verb)

  • Meaning: to propel or hurl something through the air with a quick motion of the arm or hand.
  • Vietnamese: ném, tung, quăng.

Example sentence: "He throws the ball to his friend."

  • Meaning: to cause something to be moved or directed in a particular way.
  • Vietnamese: đẩy, hướng.

Example sentence: "The wind throws the door open."

Throws (noun)

  • Meaning: a sudden, brief movement or action.

Example sentence: "The athlete made a few throws to warm up before the competition."

  • Meaning: a piece of fabric used to cover or decorate a piece of furniture.
  • Vietnamese: tấm phủ, tấm trải.

Example sentence: "The living room has a beautiful throw on the couch."

Related words:

  • Throwback (noun): a person or thing that is reminiscent of an earlier time. (Vietnamese: người/thứ mang lại kỷ niệm cũ)
  • Throwaway (noun): something that is intended to be used once and then discarded. (Vietnamese: thứ dùng một lần rồi bỏ)
  • Throw in (phrasal verb): to add something to a conversation or situation. (Vietnamese: thêm vào, góp ý)
